main.title: Overview: SBTCVM's integrated help viewer.
main.text:
Controls: Scroll page: up/down keys, mouse wheel, or click and drag non-link areas of the help viewer's window. Scroll left/right: left/right keys Change font size: -/+ keys Escape: quit F8: save screenshot in "CAP" directory. Pageup: jump up 20 lines. Pagedown: jump down 20 lines.
Links: Links are in blue. and they point to other help pages. Much like a link on the web, they are activated via clicking on them.
Search: To use search, enter a query consisting of space-separated keywords into the search box at the top, then click the "search" button. To return to the search list, click the "search" button again.
